title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied over resist. Blue applied by brush over a resist and over purple (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 61 x 92 cm (24 x 36 1/4 in.)
description: Tree trunk with exotic blossoms and birds. Part of a larger piece.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied over resist. Blue applied by brush over a resist and over purple (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-43.
